product_name: MaybellineTattoo Studio Sharpenable Gel Pencil Eyeliner
summary: SummaryMaybelline Tattoo Studio Sharpenable Gel Pencil draws on up to 36-hour tattoo intensity. Waterproof, smudge resistant, sebum resistant formula.
details: DetailsBenefitsTattoo Studio Sharpenable Gel Pencil draws on up to 36-hour tattoo intensityLong-wearing eyeliner glides on smooth and delivers intense eye definition in one strokeNow available in a collection of colorful long-lasting shadesWaterproof, smudge resistant, sebum resistant, and long wearing for up to 36 hoursItem 2537838How To UseLine along the upper lash line. Line along the bottom lash line.IngredientsDimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Nylon-12, Paraffin, Polyisobutene, Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline, Aluminum Hydroxide, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Silica, Alumina, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide, BHT. May Contain: CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 77510 / Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide, CI 77000 / Aluminum Powder, Mica, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake, CI 77400 / Copper Powder, CI 75470 / Carmine, CI 77266 / Black 2, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake.
how_to_use: Line along the upper lash line. Line along the bottom lash line.
ingredients: Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline

reviews.headline: Wanted to like it but
reviews.comments: Burns eyes horribly.

reviews.headline: Long lasting
reviews.comments: First i have to say, all my other eyeliners are prestige brands, I am super picky about my eyeliner. This is not only gorgeous, but it didnt move ALL DAY. and the price is great. Will be buying other colors in the future.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I love these liners for their color and staying power. They truly are my favorite. Ladies!!! I do not gatekeep so here's my hack, use a q-tip to push the liner up. It works like a charm if you love these enough to do a little leg work < 3

reviews.headline: A must have
reviews.comments: Such a beautiful eyeliner with precision. This glides onto the eye lids so seamlessly and perfectly. I highly recommend to try this one for.

reviews.headline: So easy to use
reviews.comments: Goes on easily.  Really glad i tried it

reviews.headline: Very Pretty, Goes on Smooth
reviews.comments: Thus eyeliner is pretty decent, I think it went on pretty good but the Starchrome color didn't have a lot of pigment with first Swipe- felt like I had to go over it a few times to get a more opaque line. I do think the color is beautiful but having to go over a few times was annoying, but could also be because it was new and needed to warm up??? The color doesn't pull up a lot but in the sun it is BEAUTIFUL, just wish the color payoff was a bit better. All in all a decent product and felt like it stayed well throughout the day.

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVEEEE
reviews.comments: I bought several colors because of their buy 2 get on free sale so why not!? I got the color stardust chrome, hunter green, polish white and metallic black all of which are amazing smooth and very pigmented stayed on all night on my water line, definitely will purchase more!

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: I love the way it looks on the eyes but after a while it irritated my eyes and they turned blood shot red. I thought it was something else until i tried it again another day and the same issue happened :(

reviews.headline: yes than no
reviews.comments: i loved this product for my waterline. used it ALMOST a year straight until the last three pencils i had bought broke when sharpening them. i sharpened them and the whole thing of lead came out…never had this problem occur before and all times i was using the maybelline sharpener

reviews.headline: Ok Pencil, hard to remove
reviews.comments: It's a decent pencil, so not a waste of money. It's pigmented, creamy, buildable, and easy to blend. That said, it can be very, very difficult to remove. It's nothing to regret over, but I'm gonna look for something else once I run out. If you already have this, soak a cotton round in remover then place over you eye for ten seconds, wiggle in place, then swipe to clean. It's the best way to get most of the liner from your eye, in my experience.

reviews.headline: So good but
reviews.comments: my favorite gel liner for my waterline! BUT: You NEED a cosmetic grade sharpener for this!! DONT USE A REGULAR ONE!! IT WILL BREAK!!

reviews.headline: Am I using this wrong?
reviews.comments: Purchased because I saw so many good reviews, but this smudges on me after an hour?? I love the color so disappointed it didn't work for me

reviews.headline: Don't Buy
reviews.comments: Cannot sharpen this safely. A waste of money since you can basically only use it a couple times. Spend your money elsewhere.

reviews.headline: My favorite black and brown eyeliner
reviews.comments: This is my favorite eyeliner ive used for years. It does take more work for me to get off, thatd be my only con. But id rather that than an eyeliner that doesn't last all day. Highly recommend. Affordable.

reviews.headline: my new fave
reviews.comments: obsessed. this lasts HOURS but still comes off easily at night when removing my makeup. my shifts are 10 hours and i can go out at night after without having to touch up at all. and for the price? yes please!

reviews.headline: Blue eyeliners one of the good ones
reviews.comments: Love this color wish was easier to sharpen but overall good

reviews.headline: Perfect for waterline
reviews.comments: I have this in multiple colors because it is my favorite pencil to use in my waterline—so easy to apply and stays all day. I would give it 5 stars but I do wish more product came in each pencil or that it was twistable.

reviews.headline: "Sharpenable" for who?
reviews.comments: It isn't smudge resistant, it's incredibly dry, and it does not sharpen like a wooden pencil liner does DESPITE what the poor interns they hired to claim otherwise keep saying on this website.

reviews.headline: HORRIBLE
reviews.comments: Irritated my eyes so much! DO NOT recommend

reviews.headline: Impossible to safely sharpen
reviews.comments: Love the color but it is a plastic tube, it doesn't twist up and why they keep saying you can easily sharpen with any pencil sharpener is beyond me because when I try to sharpen, I just hear the plastic cracking. Not happy with the one time use idea. :(

media.caption: I blended the liner out to make it smokey

media.headline: I think I just found the best eye liner !

faceoff_positive.comments: Absolutely loved this product! If youre in need for a eyeliner thats affordable and long wearing then this is it! Its super creamy and pigmented and last all day without smudging. I love using this on my waterline and it doesnt budge or give me the raccoon eyes. I highly recommend!
faceoff_positive.headline: Absolutely loved this...

faceoff_negative.comments: I am so unhappy with this product. Its plastic case prevents it from being sharpenable with a regular eye pencil sharpener, it is not a twist-up. My solution was to shove a size 8 knitting needle up its rear. The plastic case cracked but at least now I can try it (the tip broke off right after I opened the package).
faceoff_negative.headline: How do you sharpen this thing?

rollup.name: Tattoo Studio Sharpenable Gel Pencil Eyeliner
